name: Bilgewater
desc:
Bilgerat attacks and Abilities mark enemies. The mark stores a percentage of damage dealt to the enemy by Bilgerats.

Marked enemies are struck by a cannonball after 1.5 seconds, dealing the stored damage plus a flat value as physical damage.
stats: 999 + 135% Damage dealt; nearby enemies take 50% of cannonball damage

name: Darkin
stats: Darkin are possessed by a weapon. When they die, the weapon possesses the nearest ally champion, granting them the weapon's power.

Weapon powers become 50% stronger.

Weapon powers are described in each Darkin's Ability tooltip.

name: Vanquisher
desc: Damage from Vanquisher Abilities can critically strike. Vanquishers gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

name: Juggernaut
desc: Juggernaut champions take less damage as their Health decreases.

name: Bastion
desc: Bastion champions gain Armor and Magic Resist. This is increased by 100% for the first 10 seconds of combat.

name: Bruiser
desc: Your units gain 100 Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

name: Challenger
desc: Challengers gain bonus Attack Speed. When their target dies, Challengers dash to a new target and increase their Attack Speed bonus by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

name: Demacia
desc: Your strongest Demacians become Elite and equip a random Radiant item each combat. Elites grant Armor and Magic Resist to themselves and adjacent allies, but this does not stack.

name: Freljord
desc:
After 8 seconds, an ice storm strikes the battlefield. Enemies take a percentage of their max Health as true damage and gain debuffs.

Sunder: reduce Armor
Shred: reduce Magic Resist
stats: 10% health, enemies are 30% Sundered and Shredded for 10 seconds
18% health, enemies are also stunned for 1.5 seconds

name: Ionia
desc:
Each Ionian has a unique bonus within their Ability.

Every 4 seconds, a number of Ionians are enlightened to their spirit form, gaining 20 mana and doubling stat bonuses for 4 seconds.

name: Ixtal
desc: Gain elemental hexes, which give a different bonus from game to game.
stats: Something cool (Effect depends on current elemental)

name: Gunner
desc: When Gunner champions attack, they gain bonus Attack Damage, up to 8 stacks.

name: Multicaster
desc: Multicasters cast their Ability multiple times. Bonus casts have 55% reduced effectiveness.
stats: 1 extra cast. 35% reduced effectiveness. Multicaster attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

name: Noxus
desc: Noxus champions gain Health, Ability Power and Attack Damage. This is increased by 5% for each different opponent that either you have conquered in combat or is dead.

name: Piltover
desc: Gain the T-Hex. Every time you lose a player combat, the T-Hex gains Charges. Winning converts the Charges to Power for the T-Hex and grants you loot based on the number of Charges converted.
stats: Gain bonus loot every round. Each loss counts as 2 losses instead.

name: Invoker
desc: Every 3 seconds, your units gain Mana.
stats: 40 to all, and start with an additional 30 Ability Power

name: Rogue
stats: When a Rogue falls below 35% Health, they briefly become untargetable and dash to an enemy within 4 hexes (preferring enemy backline).
Additionally, a Rogue's first attack on an enemy bleeds them for 55% of their max Health as magic damage over 2.5 seconds.

name: Shurima
desc: Every 4 seconds, Shurimans heal 5% maximum Health. After 8 seconds, select Shurimans Ascend and gain 20% maximum Health and 30% Attack Speed.
stats: Instead, Ascend at combat start. +60% Ascension bonus
Ascend twice, at combat start and after 8 seconds. +111% Ascension bonus

name: Slayer
desc:
Slayers gain 12% Omnivamp.

Slayers deal bonus damage, doubled against units below 66% Health.

name: Sorcerer
desc:
Sorcerers gain bonus Ability Power.

When an enemy dies after being damaged by a Sorcerer, they deal a percentage of that enemy's maximum Health to another enemy.

name: Strategist
desc: Combat Start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain a shield for 15 seconds and allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

name: Targon
desc: All of your units' healing and shielding is improved.

name: Void
desc:
Get a placeable void egg. At the start of combat, it hatches into an unspeakable horror and knocks up adjacent enemies.

Each Void star level increases the horror's Health and Ability Power by 25%.
abstract: bond:Summon:(Void Remora/Rift Herald/Baron Nashor),HP/AP:+25% per star level

name: Zaun
desc: Zaun champions create random chem-mods that only they can use. Champions can be modded once, and mods can be removed by benching or selling the champion.
